titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Jean Rhees, 26. 7. 1947
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/22-3); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your note & for allowing me to stay with you. I shall come to London on Aug. 4th & I'll get out to Goldhurst Terrace sometime in the evening, but I don't quite know the time yet as I want to meet someone in town first. Will you be at home in the evening, or could you leave your key somewhere where I can find it? I hope I shan't give you too much trouble! I'm looking forward to seeing you. My plane leaves for Dublin on Aug 6th in the morning.
